entities.name: harry
entities.description: The main character in the story who is experiencing pain and interacting with Firenze.

entities.name: firenze
entities.description: A centaur who helps Harry and has blue eyes. He is described as having white-blond hair and a palomino body.

relationships.description: Firenze helps Harry by pulling him to his feet and offering him a ride on his back.
Firenze warns Harry that the Forest is not safe at this time, especially for him.
